Well, to be fair the LCS/Worlds teams use the best champions to get the win. They arent going to choose a "well balanced" champion unless they are forced to.  

And a lot of times the champion is/was always strong. Its just that getting played by the pros make them popular and force them into the limelight. Its hard to complain about Top-Kennan when you face him 1/100 games. Its different if he is in half of them. On the flipside, some champions are in the limelight due to their popularity and strength, whether or not the pros use them - Riven, Zed and Yasuo come to mind. There will always be complaints about these champions until they get dumpstered. Then there are champions that are strong, arent played too much, and not used in the pros (Eve, Pantheon, Fiddle). The complains about these champions are far rarer.

Varus and Vlad mid.

I'd hardly call them "the best champions to get the win".

Not in solo queue, no. 

But champions unlock higher strengths in competitive (but also have their weaknesses showcased that much harder). Varus is one of the best siege/poke champions in the game, especially midgame at 3 items - pair him with a Cait, Ezreal, or Jhin and you have a really nice poke comp. In competitive you dont have the problem of "We have 2 sieging champions but no disengage" or "We have 2 poke champs but Malphite keeps initating before we get any poke off". Vlad is probably more about the current Meta - he does well into Syndra by rushing early MR, and on top of that you can mitigate a lot of her ult damage with your pool (plus he does well again 2-3 AP comps cause he itemizes Spirit Visage and Abyssal so easily and early in he game). 

Those two champions fall into a category i didnt mention - they are situationally strong. But because they really arent that strong outside of an well organized team, the complaints are rare. People just dont face enough good Varus or Vlad players, and when they do, they dont face them when they are surrounded by a team thats on the same page. In the rare cases that the champion's strengths are showcased in solo queue, the complaints do come in.

Let us not forget Karma, who was powerful for bloody ages and was buffed at least twice before Lulu got nerfed, which forced Karma to be picked up for a similar niche.
I'd say that she was in the last category you wrote down.
